page.title: 10Arts and crafts
page.content: Bill Boyle started leather crafts ten years ago after suffering a heart attack.He has made a name for himself and does a lot of commission work. Do Burgess makes stoneware pots which she bakes in an oil fired kiln.She trained for this type of work in college and after bringing up her children started her business twenty years ago.She exports most of her goods to Norway and America and has just had a large order for Japan. Glenys James(Valley Crafts) employs 3 people to make brass love-spoons in the old chapel.She started in 1973 and was the first person to use brass for this purpose.She made the Prince of Wales feathers for the Queen's Sandringham Estate.
